content: https://poocoin.app/tokens/0x639a52dadcf5cc23ec8e01b95121c92a5453f2bahttps://botech.networkhttps://twitter.com/BotechNetworkhttps://t.me/BotechNetworkhttps://t.me/BotechNetworkNews The BoT Tech project was created to integrate the blockchain infrastructure into objects and to enable mining of technological devices in a simplified manner.Thanks to the BoT Tech equipment integrated into the technological devices used in the home, office or any building, you can save money and generate income without the need for an extra energy load. The BoT Tech project, which is a structure based on the blockchain connection and standard mining structure, offers the opportunity to earn BoTech Tokens thanks to the technological tools you use.Of course, the amount of BoTech gained by mining may differ depending on the rate of energy consumed and the technological device used.BoT Tech Working PrincipleBoT Tech, which has a similar structure to IoT technologies and is operated by connecting to a common network on the basis of it and provides BoTech Token to its user during the time it is open, performs mining by connecting to a computer network environment.You need to match the BoT Tech M-App you will download to your computer with the BoT Tech products you have purchased. After matching, you can start earning BoTech Tokens without having to take any action.For example; After purchasing the BoT Tech Light Bulb, you need to pair your smart BoT Tech Light Bulb product with the Bot Tech M-App. After the pairing is completed, BoTech Token will be earned for as long as the light of the room where your product is located remains on.Please note that this is not a mining program and an income generating program. It has been created to provide an extra advantage from the technological tools you are currently using. Using the sold BoT Tech products only for mining may cause harm to the consumer due to your electricity consumption.utilitySave MoneyReplace your existing technological tools with BoT Tech products. Earn BoTech Tokens without increasing your energy consumption. Both your wallet and your home win.Forward ForwardMeet with Light Bulb, Toaster, Oven, Vacuum Cleaner and thousands of new generation technology products. Don't let your old products harm you.Quality and ServiceThe products produced will be put on the market accompanied by world-famous brands. Products that are planned to have at least 2 years of warranty will be sold in all European, American and Asian countries within the scope of International warranty.Technical supportYou can get support from our 24/7 customer service regarding the BoT Tech products you have purchased. We only have fixed number service for Europe.Why is BoT Tech Important?Energy consumption costs increase in direct proportion to the constantly increasing population growth. Consumers are looking for priority ways to save energy costs of the technological product they use. BoT (Blockchain of Things) products, which are produced as a new generation and inspired by IoT (Internet of Things) technologies, allow consumers to save 40%-55%.Imagine the vacuum cleaner you are currently using. Imagine that every time you run this vacuum cleaner, it earns you a cryptocurrency that is currently gaining in value. Earn a certain amount of BoTech Tokens every time you vacuum your house. BoTech tokens are automatically sent to your BEP20 BoTech Wallet. If you wish, save your BoTech Tokens and earn more by supporting this developing technology, or if you wish, sell your BoTech tokens now and put your savings in your pocket.
